text: [Music]
I'm an Evangelical Christian which means
I believe three things first I believe
that the Bible is the word of God uh I
don't believe that I believe there are
allegorical parts to it there are
literal parts to it there are poetic
parts to it there are narrative parts to
it but I believe it's all the word of
God God second I believe that Jesus is
who he claimed to be he claimed to be
the Son of God and I'm betting my life
on that he's right okay everybody bets
their life on something I'm betting my
life that that he was not a liar and
then the third part is that we are
called to share the good news with other
people I do not believe in coercion I do
not believe in theocracy I believe uh uh
in in one sense free market religion and
that is May the best idea win that we
must treat each other with respect and
everybody have a right to share what
they believe and you have a right to try
to persuade me to say hey don't you
think this is right then I have a right
to try to persuade you there should be
no coercion I believe that God gives
everybody a choice to accept him or
reject him and if God gives me a choice
to accept him or reject him then I've
got to give everybody else that same
courtesy
